Event.Name: Sun
Event.Description: Masculine, malefic, copper colour, philosophical tendency, royal, ego, father, sons, patrimony, self reliance, political power, windy and bilious temperament, month, places of worship, money-lenders, goldsmith, bones, fires, coronation chambers, doctoring capacity.

Event.Name: Moon
Event.Description: Mind, mother, benefic when waxing, malefic when waning, feminine, white colour, women, sea-men, pearls, gems, water, fishermen, stubbornness, romances, bath-rooms, blood, popularity, human responsibilities.

Event.Name: Mars
Event.Description: Brothers, masculine, blood-red colour, malefic, refined taste, base metals, vegetation, rotten things, orators, ambassadors, military activities, commerce, aerial journeys, weaving, public speakers.

Event.Name: Mercury
Event.Description: Benefic if well associated, hermaphrodite, green colour, mercantile activity, public speakers, cold nervous, intelligence.

Event.Name: Jupiter
Event.Description: Masculine, benefic, bright yellow colour, devotion, progeny, truthfulness, religious fervour, philosophical wisdom, corpulence.

Event.Name: Venus
Event.Description: Feminine, benefic, mixture of all colours, wife, love affairs, sensual pleasure, family bliss, harems of ill-fame, vitality.

Event.Name: Saturn
Event.Description: Malefic,hermaphrodite, dark colour, stubbornness, impetuosity, demoralisation, windy diseases, despondency, gambling.

Event.Name: Rahu
Event.Description: Malefic, feminine, renunciation, corruption, epidemics.

Event.Name: Ketu
Event.Description: Hermaphrodite, malefic, religious, sectarian principles, pride, selfishness, occultism, mendicancy.

Event.Name: Aries
Event.Description: Aries - Movable,odd, masculine, cruel, fiery, of short ascension, rising by hinder part.

Event.Name: Taurus
Event.Description: Taurus - Fixed, even, feminine, mild,earthy, fruitful, of short ascension, rising by hinder part.

Event.Name: Gemini
Event.Description: Gemini - Common, odd, masculine, cruel, airy, barren, of short ascension, rising by the head.

Event.Name: Cancer
Event.Description: Cancer - Even, movable, feminine, mild, watery, of long ascension, rising by the hinder part and fruitful.

Event.Name: Leo
Event.Description: Leo - Fixed, odd, masculine, cruel, fiery, of long ascension, barren, rising by the head.

Event.Name: Virgo
Event.Description: Virgo - Common, even, feminine, mild, earthy, of long ascension, rising by the head.

Event.Name: Libra
Event.Description: Libra - Movable, odd, masculine, cruel, airy, of long ascension, rising by the head.

Event.Name: Scorpio
Event.Description: Scorpio - Fixed, even, feminine, mild, watery, of long ascension, rising by the head.

Event.Name: Sagittarius
Event.Description: Sagittarius - Common, odd, masculine, cruel, fiery, of long ascension, rising by the hinder part.

Event.Name: Capricorn
Event.Description: Capricorn - Movable, even, feminine, mild, earthy, of long ascension, rising by hinder part.

Event.Name: Aquarius
Event.Description: Aquarius - Fixed, odd, masculine, cruel, fruitful, airy, of short ascension, rising by the head.

Event.Name: Pisces
Event.Description: Pisces - Common, feminine water, even, mild, of short ascension, rising by head and hinder part.
